search_name: Threat - RR - Prohibited Process Detected - System - Rule
drilldown_search: | from datamodel:"Endpoint"."Processes" |search _time < 1501848000 host="REPLACEME" |lookup interesting_processes_lookup app as process,dest OUTPUTNEW is_required,is_prohibited,is_secure,note | fillnull value="undefined" is_required,is_prohibited,is_secure |`lower(is_required)` |`lower(is_prohibited)` |`lower(is_secure)` | search is_prohibited=true

search_name: Threat - RR - DDNS Activity Detected - System - Rule
drilldown_search: | from datamodel:Network_Resolution.DNS | search _time < 1501848000 record_type="A" `Exclude_DNS_Server_src_ip` |lookup dhcpLogs dest_ip as src OUTPUT dest_nt_host as host |search host="REPLACEME" | eval list="iana" | `ut_parse(query,list)` | lookup DDNS_lookup domain as ut_domain | search provider=*

search_name: Threat - RR - DNS Activity to External IP Detected - System - Rule
drilldown_search: | from datamodel:Network_Traffic |search dest_port=53 src_ip!=TERM(10.0.1.100) dest_ip!=TERM(10.0.1.100) dest_ip!=TERM(8.8.8.8) dest_ip!=TERM(4.4.4.4) dest_ip!=TERM(172.31.0.2) |lookup frothly_assets ip as src_ip |search nt_host="REPLACEME"

search_name: Threat - RR - Process Discrepancy Detected - System - Rule
drilldown_search: search index=botsv2 sourcetype=osquery_results columns.cwd="/Users*" host="REPLACEME" | rename columns.name as name, columns.cmdline as cmdline | eval dest=host, result=if(like(cmdline,"%".name."%"),"Normal","Evil") |search result="Evil"

search_name: Threat - RR - Threat Intel Match on DNS Domain request - System - Rule
drilldown_search: | from datamodel:Network_Resolution.DNS | search _time < 1501848001 record_type="A" `Exclude_DNS_Server_src_ip` | eval list="iana" | `ut_parse(query,list)` | lookup local_domain_intel domain as ut_domain OUTPUT description | search description=* | lookup dhcpLogs dest_ip as src OUTPUT dest_nt_host as host |search host="REPLACEME"

search_name: Threat - RR - USB Insertion with 1st time seen Serial Number - Combined - Rule
drilldown_search: search index="botsv2" sourcetype=osquery_results TERM(USB) name="pack_hardware-monitoring_usb_devices" action="added" (host="REPLACEME" OR user="REPLACEME")

search_name: Threat - RR - USB Insertion with 1st time seen Vendor ID - Combined - Rule
drilldown_search: search index="botsv2" sourcetype=osquery_results TERM(USB) name="pack_hardware-monitoring_usb_devices" action="added" (host="REPLACEME" OR user="REPLACEME")

search_name: Threat - RR - DNS Query For Potential DGA Domain - System - Rule
drilldown_search: |from datamodel:Network_Resolution.DNS | search record_type=A [| search index=risk source="Threat - RR - DNS Query For Potential DGA Domain - System - Rule" risk_object="REPLACEME" | fields src_ip,dest_system | dedup src_ip,dest_system | eval dest_system="*.".dest_system | rename src_ip as src, dest_system as query] | mvexpand query | eval list="*" | `ut_parse_extended(query,list)` | lookup dns_exclusions.csv domain AS ut_domain OUTPUT domain | search NOT(ut_domain="None" OR domain=*) | lookup alexa_lookup_by_str domain AS ut_domain | search NOT(rank=*) | `ut_shannon(ut_subdomain)` | eval subdomain_length=len(tostring(ut_subdomain)) | convert num(ut_shannon) as ut_shannon | where ut_shannon>3 and subdomain_length>20

search_name: Threat - RR - Intrusion Detection Event - System - Rule
drilldown_search: |from datamodel:Intrusion_Detection.IDS_Attacks | search signature!="unknown" [| search index=risk source="Threat - RR - Intrusion Detection Event - System - Rule" risk_object="REPLACEME" | fields src_ip | dedup src_ip | rename src_ip as src] | rex field=_raw "dest_ip.:.(?<dest_ip>[^\"]*?)\".*?dest_port.:(?<dest_port>\d+).*payload.:.(?<payload>[^\"]*)\""

search_name: Threat - RR - Long Network Connection - System - Rule
drilldown_search: | from datamodel:Network_Traffic.All_Traffic | search duration>10800 [| search index=risk source="Threat - RR - Long Network Connection - System - Rule" risk_object="REPLACEME" | fields src_ip,dest_ip | dedup src_ip,dest_ip]

search_name: Threat - RR - Non-Standard Port Web Traffic - System - Rule
drilldown_search: |from datamodel:Web.Web | search src="10.*" dest!="10.*" | eval list="mozilla" | `ut_parse_extended(url,list)` | where ut_port!="80" AND ut_port!="443" | rename src as src_ip, dest as dest_ip | lookup dhcpLogs dest_ip as src_ip OUTPUT dest_nt_host as src_dhcp | lookup dhcpLogs dest_ip as src_ip OUTPUT dest_nt_host as src_dhcp | join type=left src_ip [| inputlookup frothly_assets | fields ip dns | rename ip as src_ip, dns as src_dns ] | lookup dnslookup clientip as dest_ip OUTPUT clienthost as dest_dns | eval dest_system=coalesce(dest_dns,dest_ip) | eval src_system=coalesce(src_dhcp,src_dns,src_ip) |search src_system="REPLACEME"

search_name: Threat - RR - Security Control Disabled - Combined - Rule
drilldown_search: search index=botsv2 sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" cmdline="*netsh.exe*" cmdline="*off*" | rename dvc_ip as src_ip | lookup dhcpLogs dest_ip as src_ip OUTPUT dest_nt_host as src_dhcp | join type=left src_ip [| inputlookup frothly_assets | fields ip dns | rename ip as src_ip, dns as src_dns ] | eval src_system=coalesce(src_dhcp,src_dns,src_ip) | eval src_user=mvindex(split(user,"\\"),1) |search src_system="REPLACEME" OR src_user="REPLACEME"

search_name: Threat - RR - Suspicious Developer Utility Command - Combined - Rule
drilldown_search: search index=botsv2 sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" cmdline="*csc.exe*/noconfig*" | rename dvc_ip as src_ip | lookup dhcpLogs dest_ip as src_ip OUTPUT dest_nt_host as src_dhcp | join type=left src_ip [| inputlookup frothly_assets | fields ip dns | rename ip as src_ip, dns as src_dns ] | eval src_system=coalesce(src_dhcp,src_dns,src_ip) | eval src_user=mvindex(split(user,"\\"),1) |search src_system="REPLACEME" OR src_user="REPLACEME"

search_name: Threat - RR - Suspicious PowerShell Command - Combined - Rule

search_name: Threat - RR - Suspicious Scheduled Task - Combined - Rule
drilldown_search: search index=botsv2 sourcetype="XmlWinEventLog:Microsoft-Windows-Sysmon/Operational" process="schtasks.exe" cmdline="*-w hidden*" | rename dvc_ip as src_ip | lookup dhcpLogs dest_ip as src_ip OUTPUT dest_nt_host as src_dhcp | join type=left src_ip [| inputlookup frothly_assets | fields ip dns | rename ip as src_ip, dns as src_dns ] | eval src_system=coalesce(src_dhcp,src_dns,src_ip) | eval src_user=mvindex(split(user,"\\"),1) |search src_system="REPLACEME" OR src_user="REPLACEME"

search_name: Threat - RR - Suspicious SSL Certificate - System - Rule
drilldown_search: |from datamodel:Certificates.SSL | search ssl_subject!="*CN \=*" ssl_subject!="*O \=*"[|search index=risk source="Threat - RR - Suspicious SSL Certificate - System - Rule" risk_object="REPLACEME"|fields src_ip,dest_ip|dedup src_ip,dest_ip|rename src_ip as src, dest_ip as dest]

search_name: Threat - RR - System Information Discovery - Combined - Rule

search_name: Threat - RR - Threat Intel File Activity - System - Rule

search_name: Threat - RR - User Account Changes - Combined - Rule

search_name: Threat - RR - Potential Phish With Attachment - User - Rule
drilldown_search: | from datamodel:Email.All_Email| search (file_name="*.zip" OR file_name="*.doc" OR file_name="*.xls" OR file_name="*.docm" OR file_name="*.xlsm")|mvexpand recipient|join type=left recipient [|from datamodel:"Identity_Management.All_Identities"|search email="*froth.ly"|fields email,identity|mvexpand identity|where like(identity,"%frothly\\%")|eval identity=mvindex(split(identity,"\\"),1)|rename email as recipient, identity as src_user]|search src_user=REPLACEME

search_name: Threat - RR - Credential Dumping - Process Access - System  - Rule
drilldown_search: index=botsv4 sourcetype="xmlwineventlog:microsoft-windows-sysmon/operational" EventCode=10 (TargetImage="C:\\Windows\\system32\\lsass.exe") AND (GrantedAccess=0x1010 OR GrantedAccess=0x1410 OR GrantedAccess=0x147a OR GrantedAccess=0x143a) CallTrace="C:\\Windows\\SYSTEM32\\ntdll.dll\*|C:\\Windows\\system32\\KERNELBASE.dll*|UNKNOWN(*)" host="REPLACEME"
